properties.entry: SELECT U.USER_NO , U.ITEM_NO , U.ITEM_CATEGORY , U.EQUIP_ITEM_YN , S.ITEM_NAME , S.ITEM_IMG FROM USER_INVENTORY_LIST U JOIN STORE S ON(U.ITEM_NO = S.ITEM_NO) WHERE U.USER_NO = ?
SELECT USER_NICKNAME , COIN FROM USER_INFORMATION WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE USER_INFORMATION U SET COIN = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT A.TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENTS , B.USER_NICKNAME FROM BOARD_LIST A JOIN USER_INFORMATION B ON(A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT S.ITEM_IMG , (SELECT UI.USER_NICKNAME FROM USER_INFORMATION UI WHERE UI.USER_NO = F.FRIEND_NO) FRIEND , F.FRIEND_NO FROM USER_INFORMATION U JOIN FRIENDS_LIST F ON (U.USER_NO = F.USER_NO) JOIN USER_INVENTORY_LIST UIL ON (U.USER_NO = UIL.USER_NO) JOIN STORE S ON (UIL.ITEM_CATEGORY = S.ITEM_CATEGORY) WHERE U.USER_NO = ? AND UIL.ITEM_CATEGORY = 3
DELETE FROM FRIENDS_LIST WHERE USER_NO = ? AND FRIEND_NO = ?
